post.description:
Handles user login.
Accepts form data with `username` and `password`.

Refresh access token using a Bearer refresh token in the Authorization header.

Expects header:  Authorization: Bearer <refresh_token>
Returns: UserToken JSON (access_token, token_type, refresh_token, expires_in)

get.description:
Return validity info for a presented access token.

Authorization: Bearer <access_token>
Response: {"active": bool, "exp": <int>|None, ...}
Returns 401 if header missing or malformed.

post.description:
SSE stream for LangGraph: sends events as they are ready.
Each event is a block in the form:
  event: <name>
  data: <json>

Events:
  - node_started/node_finished/node_update (technical statuses)
  - token (partial generation tokens)
  - final (final message with full_text and categories)
  - error (on exceptions)

get.description: List recent upload tasks for current user (last 3 days).
Get the status of a background job. Prefer DB-backed record, fallback to in-memory tracker.

post.description: Cancel an in-flight upload task. Processed files keep status; others become Canceled.

200.description: Imports tenant data from a ZIP file.
